definition: Jia Baoyu, male character in The Dream of Red Mansions, in love with his cousin Lin Daiyu 林黛玉 but obliged to marry Xue Baochai 薛寶釵|薛宝钗

sentences.english: Bao-chai seemed interested in the fact that Bao-yu was there.
sentences.chinese: 宝钗似乎对宝玉当时在场这件事更感兴趣。

sentences.english: After a while, Pao-yu could wait no longer, so he stepped forward and removed the veil.
sentences.chinese: 又过了一会，宝玉实在按捺不住，上前揭了盖头。

sentences.english: Nianboyuze Snowy Mountain myth fable is a generation of oral instruction that inspires true understanding.
sentences.chinese: 年宝玉则雪山神话传说为代代口传心授。

sentences.english: Ideas on search for minerals and exploitation of precious stone resources in Sichuan are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 就四川宝玉石普查找矿和开发利用提出了见解。

sentences.english: Jia Baoyu reflected the tragic experiences of Cao Xueqin.
sentences.chinese: 贾宝玉体现了曹雪芹的悲剧感受。

sentences.english: All the gems that have been discovered occur in the hypometamorphic rock belts.
sentences.chinese: 已发现的宝玉石均产于深变质岩带中。

sentences.english: So Baoyu was left to amuse himself with the other maids at dice or draughts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，宝玉只和众丫头们掷骰子赶围棋作戏。

sentences.english: Merchant while the mother is doting to Bao Yu, want to restrain Bao Yu with marriage.
sentences.chinese: 贾母对宝玉溺爱的同时，想以婚姻来约束宝玉。

sentences.english: Merchant while the mother is doting to Bao Yu, want to restrain Bao Yu with marriage.
sentences.chinese: 贾母对宝玉溺爱的同时，想以婚姻来约束宝玉。

sentences.english: Her character is fully revealed through her help to Jia Baoyu and Wang Xifeng.
sentences.chinese: 其对贾宝玉和王熙凤的救助又显出她的不凡人格。

sentences.english: Now, let's try to talk about this figure Jia Baoyu typical.
sentences.chinese: 现在，就让我们试着讨论一下贾宝玉这个人物的典型。

sentences.english: Up to now, the conceptions and the classification schemes of gems have not been unified.
sentences.chinese: 宝玉石的概念及分类方案至今仍不统一。

sentences.english: Ishmael also felt that it would be perfectly OK to have a little chat about this fellow Bao-yu straight away.
sentences.chinese: 伊士梅尔也觉得满可以立刻就聊聊那个叫宝玉的家伙。

sentences.english: Ideas on search for minerals and exploitation of precious stone resources in Sichuan are put fo…
sentences.chinese: 就四川宝玉石普查找矿和开发利用提出了见解。

sentences.english: Bao-chai's expression suggested that she could talk about Bao-yu now.
sentences.chinese: 宝钗的神情表明她此刻就可以谈谈宝玉。

sentences.english: The gems and jades resources, as a decorative culture, are more and more in people's graces.
sentences.chinese: 作为装饰文化的宝玉石资源，越来越受到人们的青睐。

definition: Jia Baoyu, male character in The Dream of Red Mansions, in love with his cousin Lin Daiyu 林黛玉 but obliged to marry Xue Baochai 薛寶釵|薛宝钗
Xue Baochai, female character in Dream of Red Mansions, married to Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉
Lin Daiyu, female character in The Dream of Red Mansions, cousin and thwarted lover of Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉
A Dream of Red Mansions (first completed edition 1791) by Cao Xueqin 曹雪芹[Cao2 Xue3 qin2], one of the four great novels
Ximen Qing, character from 金瓶梅[Jin1 ping2 mei2] and 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]
adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
see 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]
